website_summaries.verdict: A workhorse oven that can accommodate a 26-pound turkey, this high-quality roaster is the best on the market.
cons: Oven walls are not strong insulators
the appliance can get very hot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best turkey I have ever cooked! It roasted a 23lb turkey in 3 hours and the skin was perfectly brown and crisp. I have very happy with this purchase. One tip: if any part of the the turkey touches the sides, place foil between it and the roaster to prevent burning.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

customer_reviews.title: I added 1 cup turkey broth and 1 cup of red wine to the pan(for gravy) and I truthfully it was the best turkey I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: 23 pounds turkey done. It took About 3 hours. I was surprised about how Incredibly moist our bird was!!! I added 1 cup turkey broth and 1 cup of red wine to the pan(for gravy) and I truthfully it was the best turkey I have ever made!!! I will be trying out a prime rib in my roasting overn for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Leigh

customer_reviews.title: This roaster suggested that you buy the roaster bags with ...
customer_reviews.text: This roaster suggested that you buy the roaster bags with it. It tells you to heat the roaster, put the roaster bag in and heat it up for a few minutes. It failed to tell you to add a little bit of water or the bag would melt. Our roaster bag melted all over the roaster. Huge inconvenience on thanksgiving. I read 100's of review and followed exactly what they all said. This 1 step ruined everything
customer_reviews.author: Danae Armeno

customer_reviews.title: A perfect turkey! Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I hosted thanksgiving for the first time. Neither of us have ever cooked a turkey before, AND OUR TURKEY WAS PHENOMENAL! It was browned perfectly and wasn't dry. I can't even believe how much of a success it was. We had a 14 pound turkey, it cooked in about 2 hours 40 minutes (Stuffed) at 350. We coated the outside with olive oil and some poultry seasoning, and added 2 cups of water to the roaster and that's it! no basting! I don't know if I'll ever try a turkey in the oven, this roaster just worked too well! buy, buy, buy --you'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: MrsT

customer_reviews.title: Shipping issue - 5 stars for roaster - 0 stars for shipping from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Roaster is what I wanted - but Amazon shipped it in the product box and cardboard for this is very thin. Arrived with a big dent/tear/hole in box and roaster had a dent in the rear of pan. Since I don't have time to return and get another one and since it does work and is not a gift, I am going to keep it. Very annoyed by this but cannot figure out how to send a message to Amazon shipping about this problem. Not the first time this has happened either. So beware, if this is purchased for a gift you stand a good chance of having a damaged item!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for a wedding. I got them both going at the same time with the same weight turkey in each. 1 got so hot it burned the outside metal to the point we couldn't even touch it and the other 1 never did heat up at all. Since I bought them early and didn't use them within the 30 day window for return, I'm now stuck with 2 pieces of garbage! I'm to the point of closing my amazon account all together because this kind of stuff keeps happening.
customer_reviews.author: Donne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Turkey Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a 13 pound bird in 1.5 hours. Could not believe it! It was delicious. Will never cook another bird in the oven. Clean up was difficult because I used the liners designed for this roaster. Never again. They melted against the inside of the pan. From now on, I will just spray the pan with cooking spray. I rubbed olive oil and basil over the bird and shoved a stick of butter in the cavity. Turkey melted in our mouths. Easy, fast, delicious!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Product is aweful. I am literally sitting here looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is aweful. I am literally sitting here looking at a 200 degree differential from what the product states it is at vs an analog and a digital temp probe. Do not buy this if you want to accurately cook something
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Dont let the name fool you like i did..
customer_reviews.text: After first use pan doesn't sit well in roaster...wobbles not at all like roaster I had for 15 yrs needs replacement so bought this one .no comparison to prior one 3 months later and roaster is going to the trash...junk
customer_reviews.author: Chapp123

customer_reviews.title: It stinks but it is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to run it for a few hours before you use it and then clean it. It stinks and it will put a nasty taste to your food if you don't. It is quite easy to clean but DO NOT use the plastic bags to "protect" the inside and make it an easier clean up. It WILL melt to the machine. Other than that, this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Gokey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this quiet a bit. You can probably cook two small turkeys in this at once or 3-4 chickens. It is very large, maybe too large for when I use it a lot of the times. I kinda wish I had bought a little smaller one. It is almost too large to cook less than a 20 pound turkey in. It will hold a 10-15 pound beef brisket easy. It cooks an item a lot faster than a conventional oven will, and on a lower heat it seems. I wish the rack that came with it had a way to raise it up higher, it is a low rack.
customer_reviews.author: 2Bad4All

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thanksgiving!!
customer_reviews.text: The description says it will fit up to a 26 pound turkey. We did a 28.14 pounder in it and it was PERFECT!! The thing does self baste!! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Schroth

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, Unusable Product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged beyond use. Enamel interior pan destroyed, and taped over. Unsafe for food use, so I am a bit unhappy, especially considering the sliw ship time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Smoke on first use? Don’t panic!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and didn’t read the manual at first... don’t panic when it smokes a little bit while warming up for first use! I was alarmed when I turned it on for the first time and it began to let off a smoke that smelled like burning plastic, turns out this occurrence is mentioned briefly in the owners manual. Do make sure you watch your food carefully, on Thanksgiving my turkey was fully cooked a full hour before it was suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cooked a delicious, nicely browned turkey
customer_reviews.text: A great product if you don't have a double oven!! It cooks very fast. I read the reviews prior to cooking my 23 lb stuffed turkey and I chose to cook mine at 280 degrees. It was done in 5hrs. Browned and beautiful!! For cleaning I used hot water and dish soap. It did leave some cooking residue inside the roaster but not bad. Next time I'm going to try a Pan Saver foil electric roaster liner. To clean the stainless steel outside I used a Weiman stainless steel wipe and buffed it with a paper towel!! Looked like new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it and will use it again and again
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved Thanksgiving! Super easy to use and did it's own basting....I was patient and left the lid in place (like the instruction booklet says) and our turkey was excellent. (Do NOT buy and waste time and money on the liners that are recommended to go with it. It cleans up easily without them. I made that mistake and the liner melted. This roaster works just fine without a liner!)
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Dan

customer_reviews.title: Roasts perfect meats and more! Frees up oven space!
customer_reviews.text: You need this in your life! I purchased it to try to see if I could use it for Thanksgiving to free up oven space. We’ve done three dry runs with a turkey breast and 2 good sized chickens. They were better than anything I’ve ever cooked in my oven. And truly, you could cook anything in this roaster that you would in an oven! The instant pot is overrated. Get this guy instead! *always soray it down with cooking spray. The cleanup is the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Payne

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: will cook but need to allow extra time of up 1 hour from stated time. Easy clean up. Know that I know the extra time is needed, it will be a good addition to making my holiday meal, when my oven is needed for other things. I made a 22 lb turkey in it and used the cooking bag. The bag said it shortened the time but not so sure about that. Will try it without the bag next time and just use foil in areas that touch the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Sby

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know if I like this product yet or not. Order this so I could use for funeral dinner. Received it yesterday and already looks like the room is rusting and the rim of the pan and lid is all bent. The shipping box was just fine. I usually would just return an item, but seeing how I need to use it today and just received yesterday, I really didn’t have an option. Unless they’re willing to take it back after I use it and wash it? The only reason it has a low rating right now is because of the damage and so forth. As I am warming in it now so it can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Lac

customer_reviews.title: I should of purchased sooner. What a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just used mine for the first time. Worked like a charm and kept my oven open for PIES... If you feel the need to use your oven while the turkeys cooking get one of these. The skin was the perfect crispy. (Drool...) It comes with a rack to put in before the turkey that made get it out easy breast.
customer_reviews.author: Lorieann

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfect. Follow instructions and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for making Tamales! Worked out perfect. Follow instructions and easy to clean. Tested the Roaster before I needed to cook the Tamales.. I cooked a few potatoes to become accustomed to cooking with a Roaster. I set it outside on a table. Use potholder be very careful as you remove your food. Especially with Tamales lift lid away from you as you open lid. Steam burn can happen easily. I placed two dozen at a time. Rotated the bottom Tamale layer to the top halfway through cooking. Perfectly cooked!! Received my order through Prime. No waiting!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Wow - perfect thanksgiving turkey
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY! Preheat the roaster, use a roaster bag and then insert the stuffed turkey. So tender, so moist, so flavorful and best of all, easy clean up. Minimal mess, cooked my 20 lb thoroughly 1/2 hour earlier than the butterball chart as the roaster instructions said to expect. And it leaves your oven for the traditional green bean casserole, biscuits, etc. I plan to try it for the meatballs and other recipes listed in the instruction book.
customer_reviews.author: Nainci

customer_reviews.title: Look at better brands.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2 months and then the dial for temperature control staring getting wonky. A week later it wouldn't even heat up. Don't waste your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works great & fast. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I always host a large Thanksgiving dinner and I saw another review stating how great this is, so I decided to give it a try. I love it! It cooked a 22 lb Turkey in about 3 hours. It was very juicy too. This is the first year we didn’t have to fight over the oven as we do Turkey, ham, shrimp & crab casserole, sweet potatoes, mashed potatoes, homemade stuffing, cinnamon corn, egg noodles, green bean casserole, rolls, pies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: NE Ohio - USA Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Goose is Cooked or Turkey!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing.. always wanted one, waited to long to get one and this helped save my mind for Thanksgiving with a 26lbs turkey. cooked it great, came out lovely and freed up my oven for all the baking i needed to do. didn't take up to much space on my counter and was easy enough to clean up after wards. Warning though the sides to get extra hot (duh) and I burnt my hand putting the turkey in.. would recommend this highly!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Rimkus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roaster exactly a year ago. We recently remodeled our entire kitchen and this has come in handy as we don't have appliances until the cabinets are put in I have been using it for a straight month and I've cooked everything including muffins and cookies it has been undeniably the best thing during this process. Meats do cook a little faster. But frozen meals pizzas etc are pretty right on as the timing goes.I would recommend this to anyone who cooks a lot and never has enough oven space during the holidays as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: In heaven with this roaster! 20 plus year roaster died so purchased this one. Received on a saturday, cooked a 21.75 lb thawed turkey in 3.5 hours fully cooked! Roasters are bulky to handle cleaning of course but I find this easily cleans when cooking with included rack which kept turkey from adhering to bottom of roasting pan. I would however cure the roaster before first use to get rid of electric burning smell which is insulation setting.
customer_reviews.author: Happy as a Clam

customer_reviews.title: Terminal Roaster, once and it dies
customer_reviews.text: Had for one month and lights up but does not heat, only used once in the month and half that I have had, will not buy another oster product since this one was defective and a dud. Use it once and throw away since I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: James C Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: This Roaster Oven works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought his Roaster Oven at the request of my wife. She told me she was going to cook our Christmas turkey in it as there wasn't enough space in our oven. I was skeptical but being a dutiful husband I bought it. Well...... it was the best turkey ever. Since then she's used it for lots of other goodies. She has nothing bad to say about it. 5 stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Trickle_down

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: It did not meet our requirements, regarding the enclosure and the rack. The enclosure outside got quite hot to the touch and we needed to insure that it had plenty of room around it. The rack supplied was not at all helpful when trying to remove the Turkey, when it was done. The handles were too short and caused one to burn there fingers trying to remove the turkey. Hand pot holders did not work because it was very difficult to grab the holders, especially when the turkey was very large. Totally disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Disposable roaster with decorative stainless exterior
customer_reviews.text: Stainless Steel outer shell, not roaster pan or lid. Roaster pan and lid are very thin steel and have brittle coating. Too easy to break or chip coating. Edges of pan are quick to cut skin. Except for knob broken in normal handling, ours works well. Water in roaster pan boils quickly while thermostat is set @ 185 to 190. Ours is only used to finish smoked brisket, only used by 2 old people, but has chips and coating damage to lid and roaster pan. This should last longer than me but will rust if we cook other than fatty brisket.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lee Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The best roaster ever!
customer_reviews.text: This roaster is awesome! My turkey for Thanksgiving came out better than the oven turkey. It says it is a self baster and I can't see how that is but it most definitely made my Turkey golden brown as if it was basted throughout the cooking process. I never lifted the lid till the cooking time was done and it was beautiful! I wish I had a picture. I prepared the turkey by rubbing with olive oil and sprinkling with some Mrs. Dash and that is all it took to look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tstevens1236

customer_reviews.title: Just does things right!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy lines to clean. The only Negative is you have to watch the temp its actually hotter in there than it says. I used a laser thermometer and it was off by a lot at 300 degrees it was actually 375. But we use ours for just keeping food warm or soup and it does both of those well. The light on the front to tell you when its on a=is a nice touch too! I have other roasters that does not have the light. I much prefer this roaster over the others!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product on Nov 7th 2019 and on March 3rd after using it twice during that time frame the roster is not heating. I can't return it since my return window closed on jan 31. the red light turns on but the roster does not heat
customer_reviews.author: Theodore McFall

customer_reviews.title: Nov 1 to Dec 8, 2018
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 weeks. Cooked one turkey and one roast. While carefully washing the removable roasting pan in the sink, the outer coating broke off in one spot. The roaster oven body that the removable pan sits in has a slight dent in it. While this is not a problem for cooking, why would it already have a dent? For the coating on the removable pan to already be breaking off., I would not purchase this. Look longer and find something better. It hasn’t even been 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Found this roaster on sale in March and purchased it not needing it till late summer, when I used it in july the first time it worked after that it no longer heated. My window to return to amazon had closed however I contacted the company they were very nice and helpful did not have another 1 so refunded my money. Found another 1 on Amazon little smaller and purchased it so far working good.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but do not rely on the temp control. It is wildly off. I tested it with liquid fully heated to a certain temp. Dial said 210 degrees, liquid was at 143 degrees per my 110 dollar scientific thermometer that is calibrated to be within 1/10 of one degree. It isn't linear either, so if you turn up the dial another 10 degrees, it will go up about 25 degrees in my case. You need to use a different and accurate thermometer as Oster has this thing reading temps way off of reality and no way to predict since the errors are not linear
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love this bad boy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have been married for three years and have NEVER made my own Turkey! I usually just leave it to my mom or mother in law! This year I still ate theirs(lol) but I bought this out to test it out on my husband. This thing worked beautifully. The turkey was delicious. It was moist and flavorful and easy peasy. Makes sure you get a reliable oven safe thermometer so that you can roast your bird without opening the lid. Who knows next year I may be brave enough to make the Turkey!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina-Jade

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: What a great investment this was! It has saved us money on the gas/electric bill and lots of time. So far on different occasions I've made 3 turkeys in the 12-16 lb range and they were done within 2 1/2 hours. Also made 2 racks of pork ribs in 2 hours and the meat was so tender they were sliding out of my fingers. A couple of days ago we made a roast and again, delicious and on the table within 2 hours. The clean up is fairly easy. The only issue I have is that I bought the 22 qt roaster and don't have the sink space to clean when done. The food is so worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: lseng

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: 1) The exterior gets extremely hot so it can't be carried like a slow cooker. 2) Box says 26 lb. turkey I couldn't put a 22 lb. bird in it with the lid on. 3) They need to quality control the seam sealing it had nasty gaps looked sloppy. 4) They need to an initial burn on these to get the smell out of them thing stinks horribly when you first fire it up. 5) Power cable os to short have to put it right next top the edge of the island which masks it easy for little hands to touch it or accidentally knock it off because it's so close to the edge.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I bought this in advance of T-giving and took it for a trial run when it arrived today. Could not be happier! Does it brown? Perfectly. Crisp and w/lovely color Fast and effective? Better than expected, as it seems I overlooked a "Defrost" feature, which I used. Awesome! No more last minute panic or even wondering about a frozen bird. Couldn't be more pleased. Like having a second oven in the kitchen w/o the loss of space!
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Got excited til I opened the box!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I first received my roasting oven for this year’s festivities. But when I opened the box the front of the roasting pan has a dent in it like it was just thrown around. Then the cord for plugging it in is super short so if you want to put it in the middle of your island or table you need a extension cord for it! Also the outside shell gets extremely hot when you use it so be careful not to burn your self or the little people try and touch it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Burch

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Thanksgiving turkey but have used it for so much more. Our turkey turned out perfectly even when we forgot to turn it off and left it roasting for an extra 20 minutes. It was so juicy and tender! We made a roasted chicken, standing rib roast, and muffins in it, too. Everything turned out fantastic. The muffins were a little done around the outside of the pan but still were good. I recommend this appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before Thanksgiving because I needed to free up my oven for other stuff. I like that I had a self-basting lid although I still do based because I don't think it bastes enough. Surprisingly it does brown the turkey and I have since made another turkey in it and it came out delicious, moist and brown. just be careful because it does get very hot and as I was dropping the turkey in it did burn my arm. But I think the sacrifice was worth it for the delicious turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G.

customer_reviews.title: BEST ..... THING ..... EVER !
customer_reviews.text: I was worried. The smallest turkey I could find was 26.04 pounds. The ad says the roaster will handle up to a 26 pound turkey. I figured that meant you had to pretty much jump up and down on the turkey to make it fit. It fit EASILY. See the picture. I budgeted four hours to cook the turkey. It was done to perfection in two. Even though I left it warming in the roaster for another two hours, the turkey was moist and tasty. You WILL need to invest in one of those thermometers with a wire so you can read the internal temperature without removing the lid. I'll never do a turkey in the oven again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. The first one is still going strong, but it is the smaller size one and we needed to be able to cook a BIG turkey. My husband (the cook in the family) wouldn't fix a turkey any other way. Done to perfection in a fraction of the time, easy clean up, and leaves the oven available for other stuff. We are die-hard fans.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fiend

customer_reviews.title: This thing broke in 90 days. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We used it about once a week and today it will not heat at all. Very very disappointed in it. I would not get another one like this. We had purchased one like this about 2 weeks before we got this one, and it worked only one time. I thought the first one was just a lemon, but apparently a lot of them are lemons.
customer_reviews.author: dag

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This roaster surpassed my wildest expectations! I cooked our Thanksgiving turkey in it, and to my surprise it roasted it faster than I planned for. I turned the heat to the "keep warm" function and it sat there for an additional hour, and it was still hands down the juiciest, tastiest turkey I've ever made. The skin on the wings and legs crisped up well. The skin on the breast did not crisp up, but we don't eat the skin on the breast so it didn't matter. This roaster solved our oven space issues beautifully. Best fifty bucks I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: SP0811

customer_reviews.title: Not a stainless steel pan!
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. The only problem was that it was advertised as Stainless Steel. We were looking for a Stainless Steel inter pan. The only thing Stainless Steel about the product was the thin outer surface around the unit - for show only. It still had a baked enamel inner pan, which cannot be scrubbed or it will take the paint off. We have had that problem before.
customer_reviews.author: NickRick

customer_reviews.title: Happy thanksgiving?🦃🍁
customer_reviews.text: Happy thanksgiving. Bought this for my wife to rosy out thanks giving ham in. As her old one was in need of replacement. However it’s a good thing she didn’t throw out the old one yet. I walked into the kitchen to find it smoking when she walked up to it she bunt her hands on the handles. Needless to say it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Solid design, excellent for countertop cooking
customer_reviews.text: Since it arrived, we have used this for baking a ham, slow cooking ribs, and even for heating a smoked turkey. It works perfectly. It looks good with a clean look. Temperature control is excellent, and it is sturdy. The main cooking pan comes out easily for cleaning, and the rack included is excellent for lifting the meat out and letting the pan and drippings cool for later use or cleaning. 100 percent recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Howard

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed at all with this cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have never cooked a turkey before Thanksgiving 2016 so I did a lot of research in order to avoid having a dried turkey explosion al la National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. I was not disappointed at all with this cooker. My turkey was so moist the legs and wings fell off when I lifted it out of the cooker. It cooked the stuffing inside the bird perfectly too. I got rave reviews and won major points with my Grandma who I took over the Thanksgiving cooking duties from.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Roasts perfectly and frees up my oven!
customer_reviews.text: I'm soo sooooo glad I bought this roaster oven! It frees up my oven for other items. I had a hard time in the past roasting a chicken or turkey in the oven and having to wait to do the side dishes. Now, I don't have to wait! The day it came in, I washed it and used it. My chicken turned out perfectly! I love how it comes with handles to take the meat out of the roaster. I was then able to use the dripping and juice to make a gravy. Yummy! My only confusion is the self basting part....I don't see how it self bastes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Roaster
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do, my turkey comes out excellent each time. I spray my roaster before I use it and have never had any problems with clean up. Not sure why people have problems with this. Yes, this does get hot just like any roaster, crockpot or oven! If you are heating something up to cook with, it will get hot. Solution....don't touch the outside and keep little children away from it, seems pretty simple to me. This is an excellent roaster for large meals and for use over the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife around the end of October. We didn't unpack it until today as she wants to use it for the Thanksgiving turkey. After unpacking it, we discovered two dents; one large and one small on opposite sides of the lid. I double-checked the box and saw no obvious damage to the box. So we can only draw one conclusion: it was damaged before the packing process. This isn't a deal-breaker...yet. It's just cosmetic; unless the roaster doesn't operate when needed.
customer_reviews.author: OldVet55

customer_reviews.title: Roasted are thanksgiving turkey in it. I followed all ...
customer_reviews.text: Roasted are thanksgiving turkey in it. I followed all instruction's but could not get the skin to brown. Dried all the moisture off the skin. Just the sides browned. I removed it and put in are regular oven to brown skin. Overall not happy
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for Thanksgiving Turkey
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use Thanksgiving 2018 for a 20+ pound turkey and it worked great - yes the top didn't brown but I try not to eat the skin to save on the fat and calories anyway. The sides were browned really well so still some to nibble on if you want. It did get done faster than expected as well - very impressive. ANd we love how it keeps the oven available for all the other goodies for that meal. I look forward to trying some other things in it in the future - so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: vizman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my first Thanksgiving turkey and it was honestly ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my first Thanksgiving turkey and it was honestly the juiciest meat I've ever had. Caution: the outside/base is not insulated and gets VERY HOT. Keep away from children and pets. I burnt my hand on it shortly after putting in the bird.
customer_reviews.author: CS 24

customer_reviews.title: Similar roaster from a different brand and source smoked like a 'rolling coal' diesel truck on first try
customer_reviews.text: Saved my bacon (well, ham actually). Similar roaster from a different brand and source smoked like a 'rolling coal' diesel truck on first try. Ugh. Ordered this one on Amazon with only a couple of days before the need, and it worked perfectly. Roasted two large hams at the same time. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this roaster and its versatility!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I cooked a couple 4.5 lbs pork loins in here and they cooked so fast and I also did a pasta and cheese dish which I had in a large casserole dish that fit inside the roaster. One thing I am finding different than from a regular oven: The roaster seems to get hotter at the same temp as a full size oven due to it's smaller size, so items cook much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Sugrue

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Roaster. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So my initial thought was that this was going to be way to big. And it is but that doesn’t effect the quality of the product. We traveled for Christmas but everyone insisted I made my secret champagne soaked ham recipe. This roaster was perfect! I made a 12 lb ham but could have fit a 22lb one. It’ll be perfect for a turkey. Heated up quicker than expected and distributed heat evenly. Incredible light weight and easy to clean. Considering sending one as a gift. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Was Sent an Obviously Used Item
customer_reviews.text: This product was obviously repackaged, as there was a scratch on the lid, food stains on the outside and it would not sit level.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Variety in Cooking
customer_reviews.text: A great all round product. I use it as an oven, slow cooker and as a food warmer for parties. I kept 250 meatballs with sauce at 150 degrees for hours. Just make sure to buy aluminum insert trays with acid foods so the enamel finer isn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sgurgola

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Only used one so far, loved it! We had a broken oven and wanted to cook for Thanksgiving- two days before we ordered this bad boy. It arrived on time as promised and performed as promised! Cooked a 20+lb. bird no problem and it was perfect. Cannot comment on the durability since we have only used it once. Can’t wait for summer and steamer (steamed clam) season as I think it will be the perfect tool to steam them on a table outside!
customer_reviews.author: JGray

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, and does it well
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of thses for our catering business, they get very hot on the outside, but they do the job well, and larger than discount store roasters, need 2 more, lol
customer_reviews.author: john smith

customer_reviews.title: Nothing can’t be cooked in this oven!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in time for Thanksgiving and have used it almost daily since! I lost my oven a while back and just didn’t have the money to repair it! This is able to bake a standard cake pan! I have made biscuits, cakes, casseroles! I small piece of tinfoil under the pan for spillage and there is no cleanup! I take out the roasting pan periodically just to wipe down the condensation, but other than that it is a Dream! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well and opens up oven for other dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for thanksgiving so our oven wouldn’t be completely taken up with the turkey. We tried it out on some Cornish hens prior to thanksgiving just in case it didn’t work well so we didn’t destroy the turkey. We were happily surprised. The hens came out crispy and perfectly cooked. It does seem to run a little hotter than our oven but if you are basting etc you can keep an eye on the bird. Our thanksgiving turkey came out perfect and only complain my wife has it’s we have to store it in the laundry room due to it not fitting in our cabinet space in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. I opened one and on the first use, the temperature control knob fell off and won’t stay on again. It’s hard to tell what temperature it’s set to when the knob is broken. I’ll be sending the other one back.
customer_reviews.author: MelRob

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift...
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift that is used only at holidays. It was used only once, cleaned (soft cloths, no abrasives), and put away dry. The following year for the family get together, it was pulled out of the box and the pan coating was chipped and rusted. Very disappointing considering the price paid. I'll give it 2 starts only because OSTER replaced the pan at no charge (but will it happen again?).
customer_reviews.author: David D Verbanick

customer_reviews.title: Does so much more than just roast a turkey
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for all kinds of things, not just turkey. I’m a canner and I’ve used this to cook down my tomatoes from the garden, made chicken stock.... it held three whole chickens that I was able to cook for hours and hours without having to worry about leaving on overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We ended up entertaining many more than expected this Thanksgiving - and I needed oven space, so I tried this. It worked very well. The directions called for much less time on the turkey than I expected, but, I followed the directions and the turkey turned out great! It lacked a little in the way of browning the skin, but we don't eat the skin anyway - so I didn't care. The bird was very moist and tasted wonderful. Nice little oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and used once. Glad I got the bigger capacity. Just wish there was more attachments like the smaller models. I'll have to search online for the buffet section. It cooked an almost 8lb pork shoulder roast in about 4.5 hrs with 8 cups of water in the bottom. As with cooking all meats, keep an eye on it and check your meat with an instant read thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: kValdez

customer_reviews.title: USE FOR LARGE TURKEY ETC ONLY..too big to wash in sink
customer_reviews.text: First, I have NOT used it. Bought for Thanksgiving, and that fell apart, so this did not get used. It is pretty, and BIG! The cooking inset pan is TOO LARGE for a sink, so when you go to clean it, rinse as best you can in sink, and wash in the bathtub. I regret getting this big one, Unless you do a lot of LARGE turkey cooking etc., do not buy this size. Nothing wrong with the product, just this size is too big to hanle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the fact that the pan is so thin
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that the pan is so thin. Can't we get anything of superior quality these days@reasonable prices? Add thick; nonstick pans. Something of quality that will last for years. Amazon don't you test any of your products before selling? I dare care if it's coming from another company; if I couldn't be sure of the product or the company, I wouldn't let them sell it on my company. If a person buys something for $1.00 the product needs to still be of quality. 😣
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend. It’s absolutely worth the price and is so much bigger than I truly expected which worked out so well. I have a huge family who loves my slow cooked pork but I got so tired of cleaning the oven ( especially when accidental spills occur) this is a life savor! It’s very nonstick and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free roasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for Thanksgiving this year. It was delivered today and we decided to test it out before Thanksgiving (let's face it, no one wants to ruin Thanksgiving turkey with an untested gadget). We made a toaster chicken and it came out so delicious, tender and juicy. Not having to open the oven to baste was a delight. I look forward to using this for Thanksgiving dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We cooked a 22 lb turkey for our Thanksgiving dinner. The turkey browned beautifully and was exceptionally moist and delicious. It cooked fast and evenly. It was a great purchase. We have a wall oven that is small and this limits our ability to add other items in the oven when the turkey is cooking so this was a great asset. The insert cleaned easily. Would recommend this product. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a fluke?
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first roaster, but it is the first one that rocked on the surface because of some unseen warp or crookedness in the body. It still cooked the turkey but it is less than ideal to have it move the way it does when you deal with it. It’s completely possible I just got a weird one though. The box appeared fine so I don’t think it was a shipping problem. Who knows..
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: Good crock, just needs a better lid
customer_reviews.text: Liked the overall size, the temperature control is great, it was easy to clean, disliked the lid, it has no way to fasten it down and it fits loosely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Self basting magic
customer_reviews.text: This roaster was fantastic. We used it for our second turkey for Thanksgiving. The top of the turkey was a perfect golden brown. This roaster will now be our go to and our old roaster will be our secondary. The self basting lid is a must have. Turkey roasted in record time.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a slow cooker type of meat which is good in its own way (you know what I mean)
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe that it actually browned the turkey. I was expecting a slow cooker type of meat which is good in its own way (you know what I mean). But it was really tender and browned skin. I added a can of chicken broth, but not enough to touch the turkey while it is sitting on the roasting grate. I, originally, bought it to cook wild game which is hard to keep tender while roasting, so we will see how that goes next.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I love this roaster
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for Thanksgiving turkeys, and pork shoulders, so far. It's a gem. Heats the kitchen much less than the full sized oven, and roasts meats even better, at a lower temperature, and in less time. I suggest reading the manual and using the suggested temperatures and cook times. Easily a 5 star roaster.
customer_reviews.author: A2guy

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: You can get seriously burned on the outside f the oven.
customer_reviews.text: The oven worked very well. It cooked perfectly. The WARNING for readers that NEEDS to be mentioned is how hot the outside of the oven actually gets. It felt as if I had actually placed my hand inside a 350 degree oven. I actually had blisters on my skin from touching the outside of it, while turkey was cooking. This is extremely dangerous especially if you are not expecting it or have small children.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with huge dent on it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but it arrived with a huge dent in it. It literally got here the day before Thanksgiving so I choose to keep it and use it. It worked well. Just did not brown the turkey as well as I had hoped. This could be as a result of the dent. I guess I will never know. It needs to be shipped with a fragile sticker on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L Zawadzki

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this roaster to take on our Thanksgiving vacation to have extra oven room while cooking. It caught on fire. Not kidding. Luckily I didn't have the turkey in it, only the brine. Thankfully I was in the kitchen so I caught it before it burnt down the vacation home. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: holly posey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Made apple butter and applesauce to home can! Marvelous! Best apple butter I had ever made! Set it and basically forget it. Just stir apples. It takes so much work out of the process. No food sieve for me! Used the immersible blender and apple butter was smooth as silk. Would definitely urge home canners to invest in roaster oven! mtolley
customer_reviews.author: Martha T.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this roaster!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this roaster. Used it on Thanksgiving with a 14-lb bird, on my countertop so not only was my oven free for everything else, but it cooked up perfectly in about 2 hours. So easy, so quick and so delicious. It is hard believe it works as well as it actually does -- but believe it! I've already recommended it to several friends. Absolutely fantastic for Thanksgiving with a big crowd. It could hold up to a 24-pound bird. And (wait, there's more!) we also tested a prime rib ...just to see. That turned out amazing as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chips badly & horrible shape upon arrival. Seems to be the quality of product, not delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I like this roaster. But it came in destroyed basically. It worked, but this chipped everywhere and the pieces were all over in the box. It chips around the top badly. I didnt want to mess with it and send it back. Only giving 2 stars because of that. Otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time cooking a full 14 pound turkey. I did 24 hours of brining, and it took about 2 1/2 to 3 hours for a perfectly roasted turkey. Well worth the price as it allowed me to use my oven for side dishes. Turkey turned out moist with a crispy skin. Really love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Large cooker, bigger than expected....
customer_reviews.text: We had a great Thanksgiving dinner thanks to this large cooker. At the time of our purchase the price we paid was better than any big box store I found some more products in...
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old roaster oven that I inherited from Grandma a decade ago. During the first use the "burn off" smell is very strong however it doesn't last long and didn't affect my food. I made a large batch of bone broth that simmered for 20 hours and this worked great! My only complaint is that it is hard to get clean. Had to buy a new box of SOS pads! Hopefully, this one lasts as long as Grandma's!!
customer_reviews.author: TammyS

customer_reviews.title: Oster Roaster Oven with Self-Basting Lid | 22 Qt, Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this...but it wasn't in the cards...I went back to my slow cooker. I tried the oven bags and several other ways to make the meat more moist but just couldn't figure it out. The insert stained horribly after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great, but outside very hot
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent roaster - the only drawback is the outer surface gets VERY hot, and it is easy to burn yourself. That's the only reason I didn't give it a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Heldensop

customer_reviews.title: This is Magic for turkey.
customer_reviews.text: I have a YouTube Cooking Channel. And I showcased this product. I have received so many compliments from anyone who's tried using it. It is excellent for slow cooking a turkey. If you cook a turkey in this overnight you will have the juiciest turkey of your life. AwareHouseChef
customer_reviews.author: Hellenic

customer_reviews.title: Very hot on outside bad burn
customer_reviews.text: I bought my roaster oven in October of 18. At that time it was very hot when I cooked with it but I thought it was because it was brand new. I am now using it for the second time and it is very very hot on the outside and I ended up getting second-degree burns. I don't know if this is normal for this or not I have had roaster ovens for almost 35 years. If this is the way that it is supposed to be I would like to return it. Please advise
customer_reviews.author: pattifarmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect roaster at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Made our thanksgiving turkey and it was a success! Since then I have roasted chicken and they have come out perfect, juicy and browned. I suggest having a thermometer to check meat temperature to make sure things are cooked to the correct temperature. No more smoking oven while roasting my chicken! Cooks fast as well without heating my kitchen. Great price as well. I’ve seen smaller versions at the store for higher prices.
customer_reviews.author: PamAZ

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended-Cooks well and Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these after Thanksgiving at our house and everyone was impressed with the roaster. Sat at the dinner table and was directed to order them that second 😊. Couldn't beat the price. Everyone has loved it. We had traditional roaster before--be aware it cooks FAST! Our 22lb Turkey was done in 4 hrs and was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't brown the turkey
customer_reviews.text: I'd say it's more a steamer, not a roaster. Due the juices drop to the bottom of the pan, it's not roasting, it's steaming. I used that twice. Neither a lamb leg nor a turkey got brown. After 3 hrs of "steaming", I had to move my turkey to the oven to get it brown. Seeing so many good reviews, I'm wondering if I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Save time. I never ever noticed husband pick up a book but when the roaster oven arrived he actually read the whole instruction book that came with it. It arrived when the said it was gone to arrive. Delivered it right at front my door. Great gift. Perfect...Thank You! Thank You Amazon. I would definitely recommend. What was more rewarding was seeing the smile on my husband's face when he opened the box. Again Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster!
customer_reviews.text: Great turkey every time! You get a lot more drippings using this over an oven (evaporation I suppose) so I usually reduce the liquid before using for gravy. Oh, and the turkey is done much faster than using an oven.....still getting used to not having to but the bird in the oven so early!
customer_reviews.author: skeptigal

product_meta.title: Oster Roaster Oven with Self-Basting Lid | 22 Qt, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Prepare tender turkey, slow-cooked stews, and more with the 22-Quart Oster Roaster Oven. Equipped with a self-basting lid that continually recirculates moisture, this electric oven eliminates the need for hand-basting to help save you time and energy. The high-domed lid accommodates turkeys up to 26 pounds. With its adjustable temperature dial, this versatile electric oven allows you to roast, slow cook, or bake a wide variety of dishes. The convenient 'Keep Warm' setting keeps food at an ideal serving temperature. A removable enamel-on-steel pan and rack make this electric roaster easy to clean, and the stainless steel exterior attractively complements a variety of decors. Variable temperature control dial sets roaster to cooking temperature of 150°F to 450°F.
feature_bullets: Electric roaster oven accommodates turkeys up to 26 pounds
Self basting lid continually recirculates moisture
Versatile electric roaster bakes, slow cooks, roasts, and serves
Dimensions: 23.3 L x 15.6 W x 11.8 H inches
Roasting pan and rack are removable for easy cleanup

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,038 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
